item.description:
The Wedeln Ski and Outdoor Club is part of a combined group of clubs call the Eastern Inter-Club Ski League (EICSL). This group sponsors ski/snowboard races, social events, lift ticket and vendor discounts and many other perks for its member clubs. This event, at Tia's in Boston, will give you the opportunity to meet Wedeln members and members of many other clubs. This is a great way to learn about the fabulous and friendly clubs that make up the EICSL family.

Tia's is a popular after-work bar on the waterfront not far from Quincy Market. We will have a semi-private section of Tia's. This is a free, buy your own drinks type of event.

For more information please check out the flyer at http://skiing.meetup.... For directions and bar info check out http://www.tiaswaterf...

I will be there so please look for me and introduce yourself if you are attending your first event. Feel free to bring friends. The event will start at 6pm and should finish around 9pm.

Tom
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Wedeln baseball cap - look for me
item.name: EICSL Ski League Meetup at Tia's in Boston
